description: This file defines a team of AI agents and tools for reasoning about a specific knowledge source, and includes a function to run the team on a given task.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge source based on URLs, with vector database integration.

classes.name: KnowledgeTools
classes.description: Encapsulates tools for working with knowledge sources.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools and configurations.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents working together with shared instructions and tools.

methods.name: run_team
methods.description: Executes the team with a specified task, loading knowledge and printing the response.
